sentence: Mr. THUNE. Mr. President, I understand that there is a bill at the  desk that is due for a second reading.
Mr. THUNE. Mr. President, I will shortly ask for unanimous consent to  authorize Senators to use their office accounts for security purposes.  Every Senator will now have additional flexibility…
